忼字的基本解释

忼
kāng
同“慷”。

忼
hàng
傲慢。

忼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kāng］
［《廣韻》苦朗切，上蕩，溪。］
［《集韻》丘岡切，平唐，溪。］
同“慷1”。

忼字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　忼； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页378第32
【廣韻】苦朗切【集韻】【韻會】口朗切【正韻】口黨切，?康上聲。【說文】慨也。忼慨意氣感激不平也。又感傷也。又倜儻也。又竭誠也。【史記·項羽本紀】悲歌忼慨。　又【集韻】口浪切，音亢。義同。　又【廣韻】呼郞切【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】虛郞切，?音炕。【集韻】咉忼，很戾也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?丘岡切，音穅。【集韻】忼慨，歎也。或从康。　本作忼。俗从亢。

忼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
忼字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kāng］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, upswing, creek. ]
["Jiyun" Qiu Gangqie, Pingtang, Xi. ]
Same as "Generous 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　忼; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 378 32
[Guang Yun] Bitter Lang cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Kou Lang cut [Zheng Yun] Kou Lang cut, Kang Shangsheng. [Said the text] Hey also. I am grateful for injustice. Also sentimental. Suave also. Also dedicated. 【Historical Records·Xiang Yu Benji】Elegies of tragic sadness.　[Jiyun] The mouth is cut and the tone is strong. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Hu Yunqie [Jiyun] [Class Chapter] [Yunhui] Xu Yunqie,? Yinkang. [Ji Yun] 咉忼, very harsh.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Qiu Gang cut, sound chaff. [Ji Yun] sigh, sigh. Or from Kang.　This is for 忼. Vulgar from overbearing.
